name: Antagony (itch)
description:
Download below

Antagony is a multiplayer game about the daily agonies of an ant colony. Your goal is to get as much sugar as physically possible, on some maps this will only be possible with the help and sacrifice of other players.

There are 4 different classes of ants: warrior, explorer, support and digger. You can use a different class each map.

Use the sugar in the nest to buy items, upgrades and heavily customize your ant.

Don't forget to read the Help & controls.

Have fun!

_____________________________________________________________

Latest version: 1.0.2
